EmailTemplate.description: Quote for MTO Items originally sent on a PO
EmailTemplate.name: MTO Quote from Order
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote from Your Order - {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
We have processed your request for special part(s) and your quote is attached for review.
<Insert Quote Details here>
Please reply to this email with your approval. Approval/Acceptance is for the exact price, quantity and lead-time in this quote.
If we have not heard back from you in 9 calendar days from today, your order will be cancelled.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
